data.message: Hi, Facebook, My Client has a facebook page that name is Travel Line Uk . i create this page on seprate account.but you can disable my  facebook account and now i am just moderator of this page and i have no access to share post on this page.kIndly Reopen my that facebook account . and then i will change adminship of those pages,

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out. You can learn more about what to do if your account has been disabled here: http://bit.ly/2us5o3U. Thanks! -Caitlin
